author: 0xalizk
content:
ETH2.0 clients are light enough to run on the same machine. We can have a meta-client that assigns one master (e.g. @prylabs), the others are silent workers (they keep up w/ consensus but don't attest)

If master deviates, one of the workers becomes the new master instead
